TopicTitle: Hello form colombia - a newbie player start on the forum

Articles.Content:
well,  i dont know how to start this topic;  im very greatfull with kerbal space program for all the hours of good times, and missions, i finally decided to  come to the forums, to watch the last news and know a little bit about the new release and the new dlc, and reed the tutorials, and and and ..do many things

 

so xD is my 1st day here, and im happy to finally join the forums (sorry my english i can barely write some good sentences )

Edited April 17, 2017 by jackstech

Welcome to the forums, jackstech! It sounds like you are hooked on KSP like I am and  thousands of other nice people are. I have always found the folks here helpful and interesting and now you're going to be one of them. Your english is very understandable so please don't feel shy about posting.  Bueno suerte, amigo!

So close. Sooo close. But welcome! May the force be with you.

Edited April 18, 2017 by OrbitalBuzzsaw
Welcome! Your english is fine, it dosent matter.

Welcome to the forum, @jackstech!

 

Enjoy your stay!

 

Morning breakfast is complimentary, feel free to pig out

@jackstech: Welcome to the friendliest forum on the world wide web. If there's any thing you need, or just need help figuring something out, feel free to ask! And make sure you share images of your creations - we love to see them!
